summary: I OWN A 2002 F250, 4X4, FOUR DOOR, OFF-ROAD PACKAGE, CAMPER PACKAGE, TOW PACKAGE, V-10,  AUTOMATIC TRANNY. WHEN I FIRST START THE VEHICLE AND PLACE IT IN REVERSE,  AFTER ABOUT THREE SECONDS, I HEAR A LOUD "THUMP".   NOISE COMES FROM A LITTLE RIGHT OF CENTER AND IN FRONT OF THE DASH.  DEALER CANNOT DUPLICATE.  PROBLEM HAPPENS ABOUT ONCE EVERY THIRTY STARTS.  THIS STARTED HAPPENING WITHIN A MONTH OF BUYING THE VEHICLE NEW.  *JB
